name: form-faker
description: Chrome extension to fill in common form fields with data from the faker library

scripts.postinstall: mkdir src/lib && cp node_modules/faker/build/build/faker.min.js node_modules/handlebars/dist/handlebars.min.js node_modules/font-awesome/css/font-awesome.min.css node_modules/moment/min/moment.min.js src/lib/ && cp -r node_modules/font-awesome/fonts src/fonts

author: jwynveen
